title: AI spending, strong corporate profits, Fed rate cuts seen as key to 2026 stock market
description: The U.S. stock market is closing the books on a third straight year of double-digit percentage gains. A fourth stellar year in 2026 may be a tall order, requiring strong earnings, a dovish Federal Reserve and strong artificial intelligence spending.

title: Quote of the Day by Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg: 'People don't care about what you say, they care about what you build'
description: Meta CEO and co-founder Mark Zuckerberg, American entrepreneur and tech billionaire, is known to speak his mind on success, politics, economics, artificial intelligence, virtual reality which reflects his bold vision and strategic thinking. title: Urgent need to support Atmanirbhar Bharat Abhiyan by encouraging indigenous production: Prez
description: NEW DELHI, Dec 24:  President Droupadi Murmu on Wednesday said there is an urgent need to actively support the Centre’s ambitious “Atmanirbhar Bharat Abhiyan” by encouraging indigenous production, strengthening local supply chains and promoting domestic industry.   Addressing a group of Indian Defence Accounts Service officers, who had called on the president at the Rashtrapati Bhavan here, she urged them to learn the new skills and use tools such as artificial intelligence-driven financial analytics to support evidence-based decisions and analytics […]
